Name: Beetle Jeuse
Ingredients: 30 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker just enough to bruise. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Long and refreshing with a flavour reminiscent of caramelised apple.
History: Created in 2003 by Milo Rodriguez at Raoul's Bar, Oxford, and named after Beetlejuice, the Tim Burton black comedy about a young couple whose premature death leads them to a series of bizarre afterlife exploits.
